BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: HABITAT FOR HUMANITY OF DURHAM INC

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TRANSFORM LIVES AND COMMUNITIES BY MAKING HOME OWNERSHIP POSSIBLE IN PARTNERSHIP WITH PEOPLE WHO CARE
IRS990.MissionDesc: HABITAT FOR HUMANITY OF DURHAM IS A NON-PROFIT, HOUSING MINISTRY FOUNDED ON CHRISTIAN IDEALS OF LOVE, RESPECT, COMPASSION AND JUSTICE FOR ALL THAT BUILDS, REPAIRS AND SELLS DECENT, AFFORDABLE AND SUSTAINABLE HOMES IN PARTNERSHIP WITH PEOPLE IN NEED. DURHAM HABITAT WELCOMES THOSE OF ANY FAITH - OR NO FAITH - TO JOIN US BUILDING HOMES, HOPE AND COMMUNITY IN DURHAM.
IRS990.Desc: CONSTRUCTION SERVICES: THE CONSTRUCTION PROGRAM BUILDS AND SELLS AFFORDABLE HOMES FOR LOW INCOME FAMILIES USING VOLUNTEER LABOR. SERVICES OFFERED INCLUDE NEW HOME CONSTRUCTION, GUT REHABS OF HOMES IN HISTORICAL AREAS, AND CRITICAL AND URGENT REPAIRS WHICH ALLOW HOMEOWNERS TO AVOID EVICTION AND PROTECT THE INVESTMENT IN THEIR HOME. DURHAM HABITAT HELPS REVITALIZE INNER CITY NEIGHBORHOODS AS WE BUILD, SELL, AND REPAIR HOMES FOR LOW INCOME BUYERS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: HOME OWNER SERVICES & MORTGAGE FINANCING: THIS PROGRAM RECRUITS, SELECTS, AND STEWARDS ELIGIBLE APPLICANTS FOR HOMEOWNERSHIP THROUGH THE APPROVAL AND APPLICATION PROCESS TO MORTGAGE CLOSING AND BEYOND. THE APPROVAL PROCESS INCLUDES ATTENDANCE AT HOMEOWNER EDUCATION CLASSES AND PERFORMANCE OF SWEAT EQUITY VOLUNTEER WORK. EACH HOME IS SOLD AT NEAR APPRAISED VALUE AND AN INTEREST-FREE, AFFORDABLE MORTGAGE IS OFFERED TO EACH HOMEOWNER.

BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: YELLOW DOT HEATING AND AIR LLC

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION HAS ADOPTED THE PROVISIONS OF FASB ASC 740, INCOME TAXES. USING THIS GUIDANCE, TAX POSITIONS INITIALLY NEED TO BE RECOGNIZED IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS WHEN IT IS MORE LIKELY-THAN-NOT THE POSITIONS WILL BE SUSTAINED UPON EXAMINATION BY THE TAX AUTHORITIES. IT ALSO PROVIDES GUIDANCE FOR DERECOGNITION, CLASSIFICATION, INTEREST AND PENALTIES, ACCOUNTING IN INTERIM PERIODS, DISCLOSURE AND TRANSITION. AS OF JUNE 30, 2022, THE ORGANIZATION HAS NO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS THAT QUALIFY FOR EITHER RECOGNITION OR DISCLOSURE IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. THE ORGANIZATION IS SUBJECT TO ROUTINE AUDITS BY TAXING JURISDICTIONS; HOWEVER, THERE ARE CURRENTLY NO AUDITS FOR ANY TAX PERIODS IN PROGRESS.

THE ORGANIZATION MAKES TITHE CONTRIBUTIONS TO HABITAT FOR HUMANITY INTERNATIONAL TO PROVIDE FUNDING TO INTERNATIONAL AFFILIATES. HABITAT FOR HUMANITY INTERNATIONAL ENSURES THAT EACH AFFILIATE PROVIDES REPORTING AND ACCOUNTABILITY TO REMAIN AN AFFILIATE IN GOOD STANDING. IN ADDITION, PERIODIC REPORTS ARE RECEIVED THAT DETAIL THE ACTIVITIES AND THE USE OF FUNDS BY EACH INTERNATIONAL PARTNER.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ONCE THE TAX RETURN IS COMPLETE A COPY IS PROVIDED TO THE FINANCE COMMITTEE AND BOARD FOR REVIEW. THEY ARE GIVEN FIVE DAYS TO PROVIDE ANY COMMENTS OR QUESTIONS TO THE ASSOCIATE DIRECTOR OF FINANCE & ADMINISTRATION. FINAL APPROVAL TO FILE THE 990 IS THEN GIVEN TO THE ACCOUNTANTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION REQUIRES OFFICERS AND BOARD MEMBERS TO SIGN THE POLICY EACH YEAR AFTER THE NEW MEMBERS HAVE JOINED THE BOARD.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: BOTH THE PRESIDENT AND ASSOCIATE DIRECTOR OF FINANCE AND ADMINISTRATION RECEIVE AN ANNUAL REVIEW OF THEIR JOB PERFORMANCE. THE PRESIDENT BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS AND THE ASSOCIATE DIRECTOR OF FINANCE AND ADMINISTRATION BY THE PRESIDENT, RESPECTIVELY. EACH YEAR, THE BOARD DECIDES THE PERCENTAGE INCREASE BASED ON THE ORGANIZATION'S BUDGET AND THE ECONOMY. THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR MAY APPROVE ADDITIONAL RAISES BASED ON AN EMPLOYEE'S JOB PERFORMANCE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION PROVIDES ALL DOCUMENTS UPON REQUEST.
THE AUDIT COMMITTEE MET DIRECTLY WITH THE AUDITORS TO DISCUSS THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS WERE THEN GIVEN TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS FOR APPROVAL.
